SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE RELEASE NOTES AND UPGRADE GUIDE
Trust: Keep Your Storefront Secure and Reliable

Keep your storefront, Experience Cloud site, and org up to date with the latest measures to protect against unauthorized access. Ensure that your storefront continues to provide a smooth, engaging, and intuitive experience for buyers.

Protect Personal Identifiable Information in Guest Buyer Carts and Orders
Simplify your organization's sharing settings and continue providing a trusted experience for both authenticated and unauthenticated buyers. When you allow a guest buyer to create a cart or place an order, ensure that the guest buyer's personal identifiable information (PII) remains secure. This release removes a dependency on sharing rules that were previously required for guest user access to carts, orders, and address data.
Protect Personal Identifiable Information during Order Confirmation for Guest Buyers
If your storefront allows a guest buyer to check out, optionally ensure that a guest buyer's personal identifiable information (PII) doesn't display on the Order Confirmation page.
Show Product Image Thumbnails for Orders with LLI Checkout
Help provide more visual cues to buyers as they complete checkout, and reinforce trust in your brand's buyer experience. When your storefront uses line-level independence (LLI) checkout, thumbnail images for the order's products now appear in several sections of the Checkout page and My Account page.
Simplify the Required Sharing Settings for Coupons
If your storefront supports coupons, continue to deliver trusted functionality and keep your storefront secure by default with less overhead. This release removes a requirement in your organization-wide default (OWD) external access settings for the B2B Commerce for Visualforce custom objects that support coupons.
